What is the condition for a major wound to be healed?
The character either rolls an Extreme success for their recovery (CON roll) or their current hit points have recovered to half or more than half of their full hit point total.

How is damage calculated in combat?
Damage is less than half of the maximum hit points.

more than half maximum hit points
